beginning september twenty four year old sprightly building rather upon certainty hope first entred territory tortona crossing allessandriae thought joyn marshal villata duke savoy expected speedy joyning piemontese enterprise well entred state millain encountred twenty five thousand foot divided two body ponte carone one spaniard led gasparod azevedo neapolitan conducted philippo spinola sent naples viceroy monterei landed little sea genoa azevedo marcht foremost tarrying spinola followed half day matchd behind fought duke first shot head musket fell dead wherefore spaniard though resisted valiantly yet exceeded number routed put flight duke hoping hereby greater thing glad begun fortunately went couragiously forward lost many men part whereof slain fight part disbanded march found marshal piovera come thither men guide secure march turning back encamped valenza assigning lower bank duke quarter upper bank marquess villeroy french regiment kept men upon hill behinde town blockd side could receive succour part onely bridge boat thrown poe town thought able hold longer six day either within without spanish army full opinion cared defend thinking better quit spare captain souldiers life great scarcity men tarry defend must necessarily lost much astonished confused knowing whether adventure life defendant lose town lose defendant abandon place importance added none command chief onely trusted time peace enter would obey behoved send one better quality experience thither marquess spinola one upon eye men bent though come thither volunteer marshal went villata begun make fortification would take place upon far inferior place general horse must lay aside refused others fearing lest might lose either life honour peradventure inclined rather spare men defend town held good lost already hapned marshal went villata meet duke parma spaniard observed left valenza behind took way towards allessandria afterwards towards tortona imagined would first go taking one city wherefore marquess spinola went souldiers allessandria general colonna gross men offered ready defend either town tortona either assaulted enemy saw marshal return piovera go together duke valenza hasted thither colonna men come town found provided excellent commander marquess celada spaniard nobly born come little spain seeing likely abandon valenza could suffer amazment therewith behind tree cut served rampier trench gonsaga battavilla arese fought head horse wounded villa easily disordered enemy horse without leader forcd afterwards fly back disorder villa pursued till night came soon left free passage enemy fly retreat bringing back hundred prisoner chiefest retreated victoriously towards parma city refusing receive many men shut gate upon took captain nobly treated nob lity parma rest sent quarter secondo soragna fontanello time succour sent directly millain duke modena governour would also assist state affair diversion therefore ordered carlo della gatta enter dukedom piacenza foot horse six piece artillery obedience thereunto sat immediately castel iovanni first town dukedom confining upon state millain placing artillery wall town weak old lined earth townsman saw could resist surrendered town gatta entring thereinto fell take castle wherein french men day siege forcd give time governour desired horse imployed service might run lay waste countrey piacenza help duke modena yet diversion molested marquess villa wherefore marquess carracena commanded chose best horse went first assault french horse quartered town three mile piacenza fortunately routed chased till came certain rivolet ran cross way french past rallied faced routed carracena got town called rottofreno whence foot came forth aid fell skirmish third time wherein carracena sore
